Affliction.name: Armed
Affliction.description: This guardian has a weapon and is not afraid to use it!

Affliction.name: Storage
Affliction.description: The monster is carrying some things!

Affliction.name: Extra Storage
Affliction.description: The monster is cloning its ammo!

Affliction.name: Crawlersrun
Affliction.description: The broodmother is dead! Run for your lives!

Affliction.name: Armed
Affliction.description: Arming humans with guns

Affliction.name: Blinded
Affliction.description: MY EYES!!!

Affliction.name: Scare
Affliction.description: HE IS CLOSE

Affliction.name: Ravaged
Affliction.selfcauseofdeathdescription: The Stalker ravaged you to death.

Affliction.name: Randomness
Affliction.description: This affliction is like, totally random.

Affliction.name: Armedbtc
Affliction.description: This shambler has a weapon and is not afraid to use it!

Affliction.name: Fake death
Affliction.description: It's not really dead!

Affliction.name: Fake death
Affliction.description: It's not really dead!

Affliction.name: Damaged
Affliction.description: The monster is DAMAGED. Becomes slower and has less health.

Affliction.name: Infected Suit
Affliction.description: The patient has encased himself inside the Infected Suit and was melted inside.
Affliction.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You've been trapped inside the suit and melted.

Affliction.name: Flora Resistance
Affliction.description: Flora be gone.

Affliction.name: Boxcutter Dizziness
Affliction.description: You were hit by a Europan Boxcutter, your vision gets blurry and your feel your stomach turning inside out.

Affliction.name: Discombobulate
Affliction.description: Your try to move but your limbs seem to have a mind of its own.

Affliction.name: Growth
Affliction.description: The creature is growing.

Affliction.name: Fish
Affliction.description: Fish Fish McBites, McBites

Affliction.name: Tryposlugs
Affliction.description: The area has clustered holes caused by an infestation of parasites that quickly reproduce at an alarming rate under the skin.
Affliction.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You have succumbed to a tryposlug infestation.

Affliction.name: Tryposlug Infestation
Affliction.description: An infestation of parasites that quickly reproduce at an alarming rate under the skin.

Affliction.name: Attacked
Affliction.description: Something that has to do with attacking.

Affliction.name: Growth
Affliction.description: The creature is growing.

Affliction.name: Mother Growth
Affliction.description: The crawler is becoming a mother!

Affliction.name: Crawler Egg Randomness
Affliction.description: This affliction is like, totally random.

Affliction.name: Mudraptor Egg Randomness
Affliction.description: This affliction is like, totally random.

Affliction.name: Crushing Pressure
Affliction.description: Crushed but deadlier
Affliction.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You have been crushed by water pressure.

Affliction.name: Randomness
Affliction.description: This affliction is like, totally random.

Affliction.description: This affliction is like, totally random.

Affliction.name: Stained
Affliction.description: Someone has thrown shit at the subject.

Affliction.name: Cthulhu's Curse
Affliction.description: Something is not quite right.

Affliction.name: Spooked 1
Affliction.description: Watch out..

Affliction.name: Spooked 2
Affliction.description: Watch out..

Affliction.name: Spooked 3
Affliction.description: Watch out..

Affliction.name: Spooked 4
Affliction.description: Watch out..

Affliction.name: Bite Wounds
Affliction.description: You got bit.
Affliction.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You have been mauled to death.

Affliction.name: He Watches
Affliction.description: You feel like your being watched but you don't know what it is...

Affliction.name: Narcotic Poisoning
Affliction.description: The victim feels sleepy and dizzy, occasionally passing out.

Affliction.name: Observer's Interference
Affliction.description: Your headset is screeching an unknown spectrogram that causes pressure inside your skull. You have a sudden urge to throw off your headset.

Affliction.name: Mermaids Call
Affliction.description: Your headset seems to amplify the pleasent singing from outside in stereo, making you feel comfortable, confident and a little tired.

Affliction.name: Mermaids Call
Affliction.description: Your headset seems to amplify the pleasent singing from outside in stereo, making you feel comfortable, confident and a little tired.

Affliction.name: Sufforin Gas
Affliction.description: The patient is surrounded by sufforin gas

Affliction.name: Head Hijacking in progress
Affliction.description: This human is either already having its head hijacked by a skittering head or just managed to save itself after being attacked by one.

Affliction.name: Head Hijacking
Affliction.description: The victim was just attacked by a severed skittering head.

Affliction.name: Eaten Alive
Affliction.description: Your being swallowed alive!
